page.title: 05SPROATLEY VILLAGE CHURCH
page.content: Sproatley village church is probably one the oldest buildings in the area. There are 10 bells in the church but two are broken,there are also 2 church organs in the present church which is 99 years old. The Vicar at Sproatley Church is called Reverend Baker and he conducts services on a sunday in the church. He also does marriage,funerals and christenings when they are needed in the village. Rev.Baker actually lives in Preston, another village about 3 miles from the church and he sometimes goes to Preston church as well as Sproatley. The church used to be almost in the middle of the village but with the new estate having been built the church is now at the south-east corner of the village.
